name: Storming Area 15: Alien Rescue
description:
Storming Area 15: Alien Rescue

Play as an alien who wants to rescue their friends from humans. They are locked up in the most secure facility on the earth, Area 15. It is well known as the center of extraterrestrials research and weapon experiments on earth.

Swipe up and down or left and right to move your character, but, remember, this facility is heavily guarded by deadly weapons. The key is, think before you move.

🏆⭐ Unlock All the Ships ⭐🏆

Unlock all the available ships and play with them.

🏆⭐ Complete Mission ⭐🏆

Complete the mission and collect the reward.

🏆⭐ Try Your Luck in Wheel of Fortune Mini-Game ⭐🏆

Play wheel of fortune mini-game and claim the reward.

Feedbacks and Suggestions

Let me know in the comment section below if you have any feedback or suggestions that can help improve this game or anything.

You can also join our Discord server at https://discord.gg/5wkD4ja7rH, you can ask anything.
